name: HRLDNGS
description:
HRLDNGS:

You, an evil being from the Dark Universe, must capture the HRLDs from across the many worlds within the Haroldverse. 

Your portals are set,  and the HRLDs are unknowingly falling into your very obvious trap. 

It's time they fulfilled their destiny, which is to help you achieve yours...

A game about HRLD that's inspired by Lemmings. Created for the Harold Jam 2022: Dark Universe.

SPECIAL THANKS:

KV_Kingdom KV_Kingdom - itch.io for the HRLD art and concept Hrld Qst by KV_Kingdom (itch.io)!

Human Human - itch.io and the RPG Beta Testers Server.

Lai and Madchew!

You for playing!
